name: Paula Herber
content: Prof. Dr. Paula Herber © herberProf. Dr. Paula Herber AGÂ Embedded Systems EinsteinstraÃe 62, Room 216 48149 MÃ¼nster Â Sprechstunde: nach Vereinbarung Phone: +49 251 83-32421 paula.herber@uni-muenster.de Â Alle Anfragen an die PrÃ¼fungsbeauftragten der Informatik bitte anÂ pbbscinf@uni-muenster.de. Â Â Â Curriculum Vitae Prof. Dr.-Ing. Paula Herber received her Ph.D. from TU Berlin in 2010. She worked as a postdoc at the International Computer Science Institute (ICSI) in Berkeley, California, as a substitute professor at the University of Potsdam, and as a postdoc and independent research group leader in the Software Engineering and Embedded Systems group at TU Berlin. Since October 2018, she is a full professor at the University of MÃ¼nster and head of the Embedded Systems Group at the Computer Science Department. Since May 2021, she is also a part-time professor at the University of Twente in the Formal Methods and Tools group. Her main research interests are quality assurance for intelligent embedded systems, test automation, and formal methods. Main Research Interests Software Engineering for Intelligent Embedded Systems Safety, Security, Reliability and Resilience Formal Verification and Test Automation Also see my research projects and publications.
